Entries.Wed8: Yes, I was married once to two wonderful ladies, a long time ago. Did I ever tell you that?$s#$e#They died in a car accident... I still think about them every day.$s#$e#I like to think that what I do here at the saloon is to fulfill the dream we had together. First and foremost, just spread joy. I don't think they'd want anything less.
Entries.Wed10: After my wives passed away, marrying again isn't for me.#$e#Despite life's hardships, we must never forget to spread joy to those around us.

Entries.fall_Wed8: What's the secret to a lifelong marriage? Well that's quite a question!#$b#Of course, there are countless answers, and there are even more if you have more than one spouse.#$b# but the one thing all those answers have in common...#$b#...is that you must love, simply and unceasingly.
Entries.fall_Sat4: Does Alex only spend time with that girl Haley? She's a good girl, but I wonder whether she gives him the kind of support he needs. I think he should have other girlfriends too.

Entries.Fri4: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#...It's one of the reason I didn't want any more wives...$u

Entries.summer_Fri10: @, if I ever have kids with my future spouses, I'm going to make sure they have the best dad ever.#$e#That'd be my greatest victory. And it's a possibility to look forward to, you know?

Entries.spring_23_1: I sure hope the flower dance is a success again this year.#$e#Tomorrow you should try talking with some of the girls.#$b#There aren't a lot of young couples these days. I think it would be great for the valley if you marry a couple of them.

Entries.event_postmarriage1: Yeah, I hope so too. Maybe the mayor knows what was here before the farm...
Entries.event_postmarriage2: Too bad. It would be awesome to see a ghost.

Entries.Rainy_Night_1: #$c .5#It's a good night to see a ghost...#Hey! You look like you've been hard at work. Can I help you relax somehow?#$e#If you want I... I can give you a blowjob when we are in bed...$4^Have you been working hard? You look cute when you're a little exhausted.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...$l#$b#Maybe I should turn it off actually... I need you to fuck me tonight but we always end up sweaty afterwards if I don't.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_5: Hey! Tell me about your day. Did anything exciting happen?$h
Entries.summer_8: Sorry about the smell... I think we're going to have to stop having sex while is this hot.#$b#.....#$b#Just kidding!. Hahaha, you should have seen your face.$1

Entries.sophia_event7: Then we'll make pancakes and hashbrowns! It's what we decided to do before you woke up.$1

Entries.Wed8: Sebastian's father? Let's just say things didn't work out.$2

Entries.event_pool4: ...Oh, @. I thought you did, but I wasn't sure.$6#$b#I'm so glad.$6^You look so beautiful tonight... I... *gasp*$6

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.#$b#Especially the days we make love.$4

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: It's raining a lot.#$b#There is something calming about making love when it's raining.$4#$e#Don't come back too late tonight.$4
Entries.Outdoor_4: Good morning! I was wondering when you'd finally roll out of bed!$h#$e#It's okay though... You deserve a good night of rest after what you did to me last night.$4
Entries.summer_7: I'll never forget that bear that showed up on our camping trip.#$b#Interrupted by a bear during my first time... I don't think many people can say the same.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#I swept the whole house, washed the windows, dusted, and cleaned the fridge. It was a very productive day!#Maybe someday when we retire, You, the others and I can travel the world, like my parents. At least just for a little bit.$u

Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Finally you're home... I've been craving you all day.$4#$b#Don't take too long to come to bed.$4
Entries.Good_4: Mmm... You smell nice today.$4#$e#I still don't understand why I like your smell so much...#$b#Maybe it's a pheromone thing?.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_5: Today I was thinking about making a painting of us making love.$4#$b#Not to sell it of course, but sex between people who love each other is something beautiful.#$b#I want to try to capture it in a painting.#$b#I need to get a camera so we can make some reference material.$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and stay warm.#$b#Besides, I've have been extra horny all day... You better be prepared.$4
Entries.fall_10: Do you think Emily likes her work at the Saloon? Hm, I wonder if she'll stop working there soon...#$e#I always got the sense that she is meant for more than waiting tables.

Entries.EmilyDoneCamping: Thanks for joining me last night... I had a great time.^Do you think the bear had fun too?.^^See you soon^^  Love, Emily
